thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Kassidy Diaz
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Kassidy Diaz

author: Kassidy Diaz
title: Kassidy Diaz
text: I have not even received my shirts yet and I could not be more satisfied with the customer service this company holds! I needed tshirts here within a couple of days, I was helped by three different employee's online. They were so very helpful with all of my questions from design, to sizing. Truly amazing customer service. I just received a text to my phone with "Your awesomeness is on its way!" and my UPS tracking number. I cannot wait to receive our customized tshirts. Thank you Rush Order Tees for wonderful business!!
